LEGAL.DISPUTE_RESOLUTION_CONTENT:
When disputes or complaints arise, OKdimall encourages negotiation and mediation between the parties to reach a consensus on the resolution. If both parties cannot negotiate and request OKdimall to resolve the matter, OKdimall's decision shall be final.

Dispute Resolution Contact Point:

OKDIMALL VIETNAM TRADE AND TOURISM SERVICE CO., LTD

  • 3/2 Nguyen Lo Trach, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam
  • Email: ca@OKdimall.com
  • Hotline: 0886479456

Dispute Resolution Process:

  1. OKdimall receives the complaint or dispute information.
  2. OKdimall verifies the information.
  3. OKdimall acts as a third-party mediator for members (in case of disputes between Buyers and Suppliers), or negotiates with members (in case of disputes between members and OKdimall).
  4. Resolve the dispute through negotiation and mediation if successful.
  5. If negotiation and mediation fail, the dispute shall be resolved at the competent People's Court. The court's ruling is binding on all parties.

Specifically:

+ In case of disputes between Suppliers and Buyers:

All parties must take an active role in resolving the issue. The OKdimall.com e-commerce service website is responsible for mediating between the Service User and the Accommodation Service Provider, facilitating reconciliation and promoting the resolution process between both parties.

The Accommodation Service Provider is responsible for providing certified documents related to the disputed matter to the Service User. OKdimall.com will be responsible for providing information related to one party member if requested by the other party.

After the Service User and the Accommodation Service Provider have resolved the dispute, both parties must report back to the OKdimall.com e-commerce service website management. In cases where the dispute arises from the Accommodation Service Provider's fault, OKdimall.com will take measures including warnings, account suspension, or referral to competent legal authorities depending on the severity of the violation.

If negotiation cannot resolve the dispute between the Service User and the Accommodation Service Provider, either party has the right to bring the case to the competent People's Court for resolution.

+ In case of disputes between members (general users) and OKdimall:

OKdimall bears the greatest responsibility in resolving disputes, mediating, and ensuring member interests. If the dispute is determined to be OKdimall's fault, the website administration will promptly propose a resolution to meet the criteria set by the other party.

If the negotiation does not achieve the desired outcome, either party has the right to bring the case to the competent People's Court for resolution.

OKdimall commits to resolving all disputes and complaints objectively, based on contractual agreements and legal regulations.
LEGAL.PRIVACY_POLICY_CONTENT:
Purpose and Scope of Data Collection

+ Purpose of data collection:

We collect personal information only as necessary to serve the following purposes:

  • Orders: to process issues related to your orders;
  • Account Maintenance: to create and maintain your account with us, including loyalty programs or reward programs associated with your account.
  • Consumer Services, Customer Care Services: including responses to your requests, complaints, and feedback;
  • Personalization: We may combine collected data to have a more complete view of a consumer and thereby allow us to serve better with stronger personalization in aspects including but not limited to:
    • (i) to improve and personalize your experience on the Okdimall.com e-commerce website
    • (ii) to improve utilities, services, adjust them to personalized needs and develop new service ideas
    • (iii) to serve you with recommendations and advertisements tailored to your interests.
  • Security: for the purpose of preventing activities that destroy customer user accounts or customer impersonation activities.
  • Legal requirements: depending on legal regulations at each time, we may collect, store and provide information as required by competent state authorities.

+ Scope of collection:

For Sellers: Okdimall.com collects information about: Address, email, password, full name, phone number, tax code/issue date/place of issue.

For Buyers: Okdimall.com collects the following information: Full name; address; phone number; email.

Scope of Information Use:

Okdimall.com will use the personal information provided by Customers to perform the following tasks:

  • Assist Customers in answering all questions and concerns related to products/services that Customers are interested in;
  • Provide information related to products and new promotions/offers for Customers if they subscribe to email notifications;
  • Prevent activities that destroy Customer user accounts or member impersonation activities;
  • Contact and resolve issues with Customers in special cases.
  • Support the customer care system, customer management, care and receive feedback from Okdimall.com customers.
  • In case of legal requirements: Okdimall.com e-commerce transactions are responsible for cooperating to provide member personal information when requested by judicial authorities including: the Procuracy, Courts, and Police investigation agencies related to any legal violations by Customers.

Third Parties Authorized to Access Customer Personal Information:

We will not provide your personal information to any third party, except for certain necessary activities below:

  • Partners who are service providers for us related to order fulfillment, limited to the scope of necessary information and subject to security and privacy regulations for personal information.
  • We may use services from a third-party service provider for certain activities related to the Okdimall.com website, and such third party may access or process personal information in the course of providing such services. We require these third parties to comply with all personal information protection laws and security requirements related to personal information.
  • Legal requirements: We may disclose personal information if required by law and such disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with legal processes.
  • Business transfer (if any): in the case of merger, consolidation in whole or in part with another company, the buyer will have access to information stored and maintained by us, including personal information.

Information Storage Duration:

Customer personal information will be stored until the customer requests cancellation or the customer logs in and performs the cancellation themselves. In all cases, customer personal information will be secured on Okdimall.com servers.

Address of the Organization Collecting and Managing Personal Information:

Organization name: OKDIMALL.COM VIETNAM JOINT STOCK COMPANY

Tax code: 4201934832

3/2 Nguyen Lo Trach, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

Hotline: +84 886 479 456

Email: info@okdimall.com

Means and Tools for Users to Access and Edit Their Personal Data:

Users have the right to access, review, update, edit or delete their personal data by logging into their account on Okdimall.com and editing their personal information, or users can request Okdimall.com to assist with this.

Logging into the Okdimall.com website can be done on computers, phones, or other devices with website access capabilities.

Commitment to Customer Personal Information Security

User personal information on Okdimall.com is committed to being secured according to the personal information protection policy. Collection and use of user information is only carried out with the user's consent except in cases where the law provides otherwise or other agreements. We commit that:

  • We will not use, transfer, provide or disclose to any third party about user personal information without the user's consent for profit.
  • In case the server storing information is attacked by hackers leading to loss of member personal data, Okdimall.com will be responsible for reporting the incident to investigation authorities for timely processing and notifying users.
  • We require individuals when registering accounts and using services on Okdimall.com to provide complete relevant personal information and be responsible for the accuracy, legality and currency of such information. The company is not responsible for and will not resolve any complaints related to user rights if the personal information provided by the user is found to be inaccurate.
  • Okdimall.com will not be responsible in cases where personal information is leaked due to technical errors, transmission errors, software errors or other errors not caused by the company.

The Website Establishes Personal Information Protection Systems Through:

  1. Establishing firewall systems to prevent network attacks.
  2. Technical team and company staff regularly monitor all website activities. Ensuring all attacks from any direction are detected in time and countermeasures are implemented.
  3. Personal information and private data of users will be stored according to company regulations and strictly secured according to legal regulations.

Mechanism for Receiving and Resolving Consumer Complaints Regarding Personal Information Misuse:

When consumers discover that their personal information on Okdimall.com is being used for the wrong purpose or outside the disclosed scope, consumers can file complaints to OKdimall Trade and Tourism Service Co., Ltd through the following methods:

  • Call the hotline: +84 886 479 456
  • Send a complaint email to: info@okdimall.com
  • Send a written complaint by mail or submit directly at the company headquarters: 3/2 Nguyen Lo Trach, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

The processing time for complaints related to customer personal information is 07 working days from the date of receiving the customer's complaint.

In all cases, Okdimall.com prioritizes negotiation and mediation with Customers to reach agreement on complaint resolution measures.

In cases where both parties cannot reach the desired agreement leading to failed negotiation and mediation, either party has the right to bring the case to the competent People's Court for resolution according to legal regulations.

Purpose and Scope of Data Collection

Purpose of data collection:

We collect personal information only as necessary to serve the following purposes:

  • Orders: to process issues related to your orders;
  • Account Maintenance: to create and maintain your account with us, including loyalty programs or reward programs associated with your account.
  • Consumer Services, Customer Care Services: including responses to your requests, complaints, and feedback;
  • Personalization: We may combine collected data to have a more complete view of a consumer and thereby allow us to serve better with stronger personalization in aspects including but not limited to: (i) to improve and personalize your experience on the OKdimall e-commerce website (ii) to improve utilities, services, adjust them to personalized needs and develop new service ideas (iii) to serve you with recommendations and advertisements tailored to your interests.
  • Security: for the purpose of preventing activities that destroy customer user accounts or customer impersonation activities.
  • Legal requirements: depending on legal regulations at each time, we may collect, store and provide information as required by competent state authorities.

Scope of collection:

For Sellers: OKdimall collects information about: Email address, password, full name, phone number, tax code/issue date/place of issue.

For Buyers: OKdimall collects the following information: Full name; address; phone number; email.

Scope of Information Use:

OKdimall will use the personal information provided by Customers to perform the following tasks:

  • Assist Customers in answering all questions and concerns related to products/services that Customers are interested in;
  • Provide information related to products and new promotions/offers for Customers if they subscribe to email notifications;
  • Prevent activities that destroy Customer user accounts or member impersonation activities;
  • Contact and resolve issues with Customers in special cases.
  • Support the customer care system, customer management, care and receive feedback from OKdimall customers.
  • In case of legal requirements: OKdimall e-commerce transactions are responsible for cooperating to provide member personal information when requested by judicial authorities including: the Procuracy, Courts, and Police investigation agencies related to any legal violations by Customers.

Third Parties Authorized to Access Customer Personal Information:

We will not provide your personal information to any third party, except for certain necessary activities below:

  • Partners who are service providers for us related to order fulfillment, limited to the scope of necessary information and subject to security and privacy regulations for personal information.
  • We may use services from a third-party service provider for certain activities related to the OKdimall website, and such third party may access or process personal information in the course of providing such services. We require these third parties to comply with all personal information protection laws and security requirements related to personal information.
  • Legal requirements: We may disclose personal information if required by law and such disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with legal processes.
  • Business transfer (if any): in the case of merger, consolidation in whole or in part with another company, the buyer will have access to information stored and maintained by us, including personal information.

Information Storage Duration:

Customer personal information will be stored until the customer requests cancellation or the customer logs in and performs the cancellation themselves. In all cases, customer personal information will be secured on OKdimall servers.

Address of the Organization Collecting and Managing Personal Information:

  • Organization name: OKDIMALL TRADE AND TOURISM SERVICE CO., LTD
  • Tax code: 4201934832
  • Headquarters: 3/2 Nguyen Lo Trach, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam
  • Hotline: 0886 479 456
  • Email: ca@OKdimall.com

Means and Tools for Users to Access and Edit Their Personal Data:

Users have the right to access, review, update, edit or delete their personal data by logging into their account on OKdimall and editing their personal information, or users can request OKdimall to assist with this. Logging into the OKdimall website can be done on computers, phones, or other devices with website access capabilities.

Commitment to Customer Personal Information Security

User personal information on OKdimall is committed to being secured according to the personal information protection policy. Collection and use of user information is only carried out with the user's consent except in cases where the law provides otherwise or other agreements. We commit that:

  • We will not use, transfer, provide or disclose to any third party about user personal information without the user's consent for profit.
  • In case the server storing information is attacked by hackers leading to loss of member personal data, OKdimall will be responsible for reporting the incident to investigation authorities for timely processing and notifying users.
  • We require individuals when registering accounts and using services on OKdimall to provide complete relevant personal information and be responsible for the accuracy, legality and currency of such information. The company is not responsible for and will not resolve any complaints related to user rights if the personal information provided by the user is found to be inaccurate.
  • OKdimall will not be responsible in cases where personal information is leaked due to technical errors, transmission errors, software errors or other errors not caused by the company.

The website establishes personal information protection systems through the following methods:

  1. Establishing firewall systems to prevent network attacks.
  2. Technical team and company staff regularly monitor all website activities. Ensuring all attacks from any direction are detected in time and countermeasures are implemented.
  3. Personal information and private data of users will be stored according to company regulations and strictly secured according to legal regulations.

Online Payment Security Policy

The payment transaction policy for domestic and international cards ensures compliance with the security standards of Payment Gateway Partners/e-wallets including:

  • Internet data security standard SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) issued by GlobalSign. Payment data security standard certification (PCI DSS) provided by Trustwave.
  • MD5 128-bit encryption standard.
  • Information security principles and regulations in the financial and banking industry as stipulated by the State Bank of Vietnam.
  • Customer payment card information is not stored on the website system but is stored and secured according to international PCI DSS standards on Payment Gateway Partners/e-wallets.
  • Customers access the website through the HTTPS protocol.
  • Customers have the option to use OTP for access and transactions.
  • Internal systems between modules of Payment Gateway Partners/e-wallets use encrypted key exchange methods: Internal application data exchange systems are encrypted using private & public key pairs ensuring data security and integrity.

OKdimall's payment transaction security policy applies to Customers on the platform:

  • OKdimall does not directly store customer card information. Customer card information security is handled by Payment Gateway Partners/e-wallets.
  • For international cards: Customer payment card information that can be used to establish transactions is not stored on OKdimall's system. Payment Gateway Partners/e-wallets will store and secure this information.
  • For domestic cards: OKdimall only stores order/appointment codes, transaction codes, and bank names.
  • OKdimall commits to strictly implementing necessary security measures for all payment activities on the Website.

Notes for online payments:

  • Only use websites with safe payment certificates.
  • Never allow others to borrow your card or account for payments on the website.
  • In case of unwanted transactions on OKdimall, customers should contact the Customer Service hotline published on the website and the Payment Gateway/Bank hotline where the transaction originated.
  • Check your bank account regularly to ensure all card transactions are under your control.

Mechanism for Receiving and Resolving Consumer Complaints Regarding Personal Information Misuse:

When consumers discover that their personal information on OKdimall is being used for the wrong purpose or outside the disclosed scope, consumers can file complaints to OKdimall Trade and Tourism Service Co., Ltd through the following methods:

  • Call the hotline: 0886 479 456
  • Send a complaint email to: ca@OKdimall.com
  • Send a written complaint by mail or submit directly at the company headquarters: 3/2 Nguyen Lo Trach, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

The processing time for complaints related to customer personal information is 07 working days from the date of receiving the customer's complaint.

In all cases, OKdimall prioritizes negotiation and mediation with Customers to reach agreement on complaint resolution measures.

In cases where both parties cannot reach the desired agreement leading to failed negotiation and mediation, either party has the right to bring the case to the competent People's Court for resolution according to legal regulations.
